title: Farm Mapping System
subtitle: Draw and manage your farm boundaries and sections

instructions.title: Getting Started
instructions.tipText: Click "My Location" button to center the map on your current GPS position
instructions.step1Text: Click "Draw Farm Boundary" and click points on the map to draw your farm perimeter
instructions.step2Text: Click "Add New Section" to divide your farm into manageable sections
instructions.step3Text: Click on any section to add crop details, soil type, and track health
instructions.step4Text: Use the toolbar on the map to edit or delete sections as needed

toast.boundarySaved: Farm boundary saved to local storage!
